author: wn.com
title: Overall slowdown particularly in overnight stays from residents (Statistics Portugal)
text: ( Source : Statistics Portugal ) Summary Hotel establishments recorded 7.2 million overnight stays in August 2015 , corresponding to a year-on-year increase of 2.5%, below the result of July (+6.7%). Overnight stays from residents slowed down
